website_summaries.verdict: An extra-large capacity towel warmer from a trusted brand.
pros: Customers rave about this warmer's large design, which fits two larger towels or a blanket
cons: There is an initial chemical smell, although it tends to diminish over time

customer_reviews.title: Save your money - don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: It's only getting two stars because when it worked, it produces a nice, toasty warm towel. But I've now owned two of these, and the most you will get out of it is six months. The first new one lasted three months. Brookstone had a return policy on it where you can get a refurbished one for "free." It cost almost as much to ship my broken one to Brookstone as buying new. But the refurbished one lasted six months. Anyway, save your money and buy a different style and brand.
customer_reviews.author: CFO

customer_reviews.title: Life is Good, but there dark times... Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July 2017, and it was Wonderful, used it every day... Then December the 1st came and after stepping out of the shower, grabbed the lid and it was HOT, not warm, reach in a grabbed the towel, it was very hot! I unplugged the unit and finished drying off. The unit had a smell to it, the lights on the unit do not come on, but the unit gets hot anyway. So the control unit in shorted out. I’m sure it would have caught fire 🔥 in a short period of time I seen one other reported the same issue
customer_reviews.author: Big Jake

customer_reviews.title: Now the bad news.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well, heating towels very warm and very quickly. Now the bad news...plan on buying a replacement every year or two. We have not found a substitute so we keep buying new ones. It seems as if there must be a fundamental design problem that should be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A Hottman

customer_reviews.title: Have to learn the right tricks to optimize effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: My son requested this after experiencing towels directly from the dryer. It works okay. You can't leave them in too long after the auto shutoff or they cool down. If you put in more than one towel, they warm unevenly. Also, you have to shake the towels and put them in so that maximum surface area connects with the sides to increase warming. Not a perfect purchase, but we have enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: PhDmommy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Stay away
customer_reviews.text: don't buy this warmer. Works for 2-3 months then switch will break. The company did not stand by their product and replace it. Used it for the winter on 2013 only then went to use it this year and on / off button will not turn on warmer. Just stopped working. No help from Brookestone- will not purchase any more brookestone products. Terrible. Stay away. Look at other comments - multiple complaints about the on / off button breaking after only short time.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Manilla

customer_reviews.title: Whooooooooaaaa nelly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for $89 two years ago and now the same thing is almost $400. What a joke, it works okay for a little shy of $100 but definitely not anymore. Unfortunate that they try to rip people off like this...
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but the plastic smell is real
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend who is perpetually cold, especially after getting out of the shower (also bought her a nice warm robe to go with it). Every other review about the plastic smell is true. She's had it for about 5 months now, and the smell still hasn't gone away. It's certainly less strong than it was at first, but it's still there. She's tried putting dryer sheets inside her robe (wouldn't want it touching the heating part), and has run it through numerous cycles, but nothing has worked. Still, she'd rather have a warm robe that smells somewhat like plastic than a cold robe that doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Cpark

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to write about a product that works like its supposed to so I will give a few tips/observations. When you first get it cycle it about 4 or 5 times from completely cooled off to hot. There is a chemical/metallic smell that it gives off on the first few uses. Cycle it to burn off that smell. Its a bit top heavy if you load it up, so make sure its placed on a hard floor in a place out of high traffic areas. It takes a bit longer than I would like to heat up completely. I will try to time it and update this review.
customer_reviews.author: J Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Only the sides heat up
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the towel bar I had but still has cold spots. The bottom doesn't warm, so that end of the towel stays cold. I put it in as soon as I get up, then turn on coffee and then shower and it's warm, except the bottom end. I put a dry wash cloth in the bottom to help keep the towel away from the cold bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Robin J.

customer_reviews.title: Hate,Love,Hate
customer_reviews.text: A hate, love, hate relationship. Really stinks for the first month...BAD. Then worked great for months. Now the lid is cracked and it will stay on all day intermittently. I unplug it after using it now, as I'm afraid its going to burn my house down. I am going to try to get it warrantied, but I'm not looking forward to the stink of a new one. Stay tuned...
customer_reviews.author: cuzisayso

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband heard a story that I told him about my co-workers dad. I was telling him how her dad warms up her moms towel in the dryer while she is in the shower from time to time. I was telling him how romantic that was and how thoughtful he was for warming the towel for his wife of 30 yrs. My husband surprised me the day before valentines day, i was getting ready to get in the shower and I saw this in the room. I was so happy! This item is very much worth the money and works great. I would recommend this to any husband to buy for their wives...especially in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: leonard

customer_reviews.title: Do not fold the towels, just drop them in ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not fold the towels, just drop them in loosely. Didn't realize before purchase, this product is ALL Teflon inside...... Teflon is NOT healthy to breathe into the lungs, plus the Teflon odor is not so pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: samlulu

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy that they honored their warranty so quickly and completely
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for Christmas last year. The switch on it recently broke and it wouldn't turn on. I contacted the company to let them know what had happened. They emailed me a shipping label and asked that I return the unit. I received a new unit within a week or so. I am very happy that they honored their warranty so quickly and completely. I love the warmer. The only reason it didn't get a 5 is because I would like it to stay on a little longer to get the towel even hotter. But I would definitely recommend the warmer and the company.
customer_reviews.author: CindyC

customer_reviews.title: Does not last!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these in January 2016. The one for the main bedroom failed about a week ago. It was used daily. I reset the thing repeatedly and still no-go. The second one in the guest room sees very little use, and is still working. Just a bit disappointed. Be advised these things do not last if used frequently!
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Only stays on for 10 minutes. I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Only stays on for 10 minutes. I bought it to warm towels for when we get out of hot tub. Turned it on when we went outside to get in tub not knowing it only stayed on for 10 minutes so when we got out and went to grab towel they were not warm anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! My husband hates cold towels after a shower and this was the perfect solution. He also uses it to warm up his clothes in the cold winter mornings. I bought it for his birthday and he was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: tramore35

customer_reviews.title: It worked...once.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the towel warmer, it was great! Nice warm towels, just as promised. But...after that, it won't start up again. So back to Amazon it goes. And after reading the reviews, I'm not going to bother to have them send another one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Can't Shower without It Once You Try It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas present. He felt lukewarm about it when he received it but L-O-V-E-D it after a couple of use. Even I LOVE to use it. Some people complained about the smell, but I thought the "smell" was just the smell of heat/steam. We had one instance where the warmer did NOT turn itself off. I am keeping an eye on it, but given that we use it multiple times a day, I hope it is just an anomaly. I sometimes have to press the button twice to turn it on, but I think that's a safety mechanism (in case someone accidentally bumps it).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm on my fourth Brookstone Towel Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my fourth towel warmer. Number one was replaced under warranty. Number two was replaced by a new one that I paid for, as it went bad after 14 months and out of warranty. Number 3 just failed after 15 months of service (out of warranty). I love a towel warmer, but when this one fails, I will go to a different type. Still trying to find out how I can repair them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Foster

customer_reviews.title: It's better than just throwing stuff in the dryer and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a weddding gift. I'm always cold.. not only do I use this for my towels but I'll put my pajamas in here.. clothes that I'm about to wear etc. It's better than just throwing stuff in the dryer and it's a lot closer so you don't have to run to the dryer freezing for your towel.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Too hot for using warm towels and may burn them
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted warm towels, bathrobes, and in the winter, linens. I used this towel warmer on a brand new set of luxury white cotton towels purchased on Amazon. Using a cold start warmer, I threw my towel in and proceeded to take a 10 minute shower. Stepping out, the towel was fiendishly hot and worse, came out "toasted".
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Sent a defective warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. I was sent what appeared to be a warmer that was previously returned, as the packaging was only partly on the product. It was likely returned because it doesn't work. The warmer stopped working after two uses and will not turn on anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Towels everytime.
customer_reviews.text: works great! it can take two towels and just as advertised, heats them up in about 8-10 minutes and they come out toasty warm. you'll get the hang of learning how to fold your towel just right for maximum heat coverage, i recommend rolling the towel into a log and placing it in the unit top to bottom, letting the folds of the towel line the inside of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly warm towels-just press the "on" button.
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much I want to buy it for everyone I know! Get out of your bath and into your cozy towel cocoon. Could not be easier: plug in the machine, put 2 bath towels inside, press the "on" switch - warm, toasty towels in 10 minutes. Machine keeps towels warm for 20-30 minutes while you're soaking in your bubble bath watching the snow fall outside your window. Others reviews had indicated an odor - there was absolutely none.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenson Judy

customer_reviews.title: It's not the type of item to brag about how great it is
customer_reviews.text: I do not think this product is worth paying $99. The on button does not always work. You have to press it several times to get it to turn on. I wish the cord was a little longer and it does not heat the towel thoroughly. When you pull the towel out only half of the towel gets warm. It's not the type of item to brag about how great it is.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: Towel warmer only stays on for ten minutes. Who takes a shower in ten minutes. Once it shuts off it cools down very quickly. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: PHYLLIS O'ROURKE

customer_reviews.title: This is "Awesome" we just Love it. I have bought one for a gift ...
customer_reviews.text: This is "Awesome" we just Love it. I have bought one for a gift we like it so much! It is perfect when you are cold. Warms your towel while you are in the shower. When you come out it feels so good when you are cold!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Returned - stinks after hours of burn-in
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Bought as a gift for Christmas and returned after about 30 hours of trying to "burn off" the smell while in the garage. Still stinks so it is going back. As a consumer products designer myself I don't understand why they didn't correct this issue. They knew it would get them bad reviews. Says a lot about the manufacturer and Brookstone buyers.
customer_reviews.author: TMP

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I was so completely satisfied with my first order that I ordered another. I've read the reviews on over heating, but bought one anyway at the discounted price. Second unit is just as great. I am cautious about it not turning off as per other reviews. I put towels in as I step in the shower. I take it out when done making sure that the red light is on.....orange light means unit is off and is still hot.
customer_reviews.author: G Silver

customer_reviews.title: Still use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it 4 stars because I feel like the towel warmer sometimes warms up to slow or not enough. I use it everyday still. I also don’t like that I can warm another item right after the first one, it’s quite a downtime.
customer_reviews.author: monica.0915

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!'
customer_reviews.text: I spoiled my grands during one of their summer visits by throwing their towels in the dryer after swimming. They love this towel warmer. And I do too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product, it doesn't heat the entire towel all that well because you have to roll it up to get it in there and we feel like it heats the second towel better than the first. For the money its a nice little treat.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Schweinsberg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: works great. Several reviews have it not warming the towels but it has done a great job for us so far. We place a pull sized bath towel in the bottom and then a bath robe on top. Turn on and get in shower. When We get out its warm and ready. We have only used ours for 4 weeks now but its worked flawlessly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 months and DONE
customer_reviews.text: Would give this high-end trash can 0 stars if I could. Spent $100 on this POS only to have it stop working after 6 months. Don't waste your money if you're looking for smoking hot towels for more than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H.

customer_reviews.title: On off switch not always easy to turn on and keep on
customer_reviews.text: On off switch not always easy to turn on and keep on. My. First towel warmer barely lasted a year because of a faulty switch. Hope this one works better!
customer_reviews.author: Ardis Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it!
customer_reviews.text: It only warmed a small part of my bath robe. It worked three times, then stopped. Threw it out. Should have listened to other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cutler.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Holds about 2 large towels. The surface of the warmer heats up instantly sand has an auto-off feature. Perfect for cold, wintery days. Very nice design. Found this on sale on Amazon for MUCH LESS than at Brookstone store. I would just keep an out for any price drops.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice H.

customer_reviews.title: also not great. The lid contains condensation inside the unit
customer_reviews.text: Confirming the awful smell...it induces nausea. As a warmer itself, also not great. The lid contains condensation inside the unit, so you end up with smelly towels that are surprisingly humid. If you leave the lid off so water doesn't collect on the lid, the towels don't heat thru and the smell seems to linger around longer. Returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Florit

customer_reviews.title: Regretable Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong. This towel warmer works exactly as described. The real problem is it does not seem practical. To use it effectively, you must allow for enough time for the towel warmer to warmer your towel, and the time is substantial. And the power required to heat a towel is not really worth it. A great idea, but not real practical.
customer_reviews.author: Larry  Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Love getting out of the shower to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Love getting out of the shower to a warm fresh towel that feels like it just came out of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Nelna

customer_reviews.title: It stay on for 30 minutes only. We use ...
customer_reviews.text: It stay on for 30 minutes only. We use it when we come out of the jacuzzi hot tub. If you turn it on and go do something else before getting in and stay pass the 30 minutes you'll get a cold towel. This is garbage. Don't waits you money. We purchase a different one and works great. This one, not so much. I wish I had kept the box to send it back and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel warmer. It is the first I have ever had and didn't know what I was missing with out this. I got it as a gift on Valentines day. I got a turkish bath sheet with this warmer. This warmer is the perfect size and doesn't take a lot of room up in the bathroom, which is great, because I don't have a large bathroom. I was told to turn it on prior to my shower and give it about 20 minutes. So far, I figure my showers are maybe 10-15 minutes and the bath towels are warm....love love love this gift. For all you men out there, it would melt any womans heart.
customer_reviews.author: melody roberson

customer_reviews.title: ... in when you get into the shower it works great! I tried to 'warm it up' prior to ...
customer_reviews.text: After I figured out you should turn it on and put towel in when you get into the shower it works great! I tried to 'warm it up' prior to showering and the towel was cooling off when I was done. Love warm towels and bathrobes!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A Brooks

customer_reviews.title: This towel warmer is very efficient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This towel warmer is very efficient and easy to use. I bought it as a present and the recipient was very pleased. However, here we are at 3 weeks of use about to send it back because the on-off switch is temperamental and not reliable. Such a shame. We are hoping that the unit can be replaced with a corrected one because it was being very enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It does the job! Nothing better than a warm towel on a cold day after a shower or bath!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I heat two bath sheets in this while in swim spa - when I get out, they are perfectly toasty. Love that it shuts off automatically making it idiot proof.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E.

customer_reviews.title: Toasty towels a treat
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. Does have a mild plastic odor, but not bad strting out and I expect it to lessen over time.warmed a couple of towels so far. One 10 minute timer cycle get towel warm, second cycle while showering gives a reaally nice, toasty towel. Also purchased a couple of large bath sheets, cant wait to try them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm Towel Anyone!?
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my mom. She loves it! "It makes me feel like I am at the spa." All the women I know hate to step out onto cold tile and get chill bumps right after shaving! This is an awesome gift for any woman and my dad even likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I'd hope, but does its job.
customer_reviews.text: This machine has trouble with big and thick towels. It heats them unevenly. I wish Its capacity were a little higher. That being said, for small towels, it makes them nice and toasty. It is a real luxury to have this thing in the winter. Just pop a towel in before you get in the shower, and when you get out, it is heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot tub time! ;-)
customer_reviews.text: Love this during the winter months while sitting in the outdoor spa. It's so nice to have a warm towel as soon as we step out. It makes the trip back into the house a lot more comfortable. I can easily fit two oversized towels (think beach towels) in this unit at once.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We have given them as gifts and it's great. My husband, kids, and grandkids love it
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: We love it had some other rack warmers before that do ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it had some other rack warmers before that do not work for our swim spa in winter. This is perfect, just place it with a cord extension close to the spa and we turn it on 10 minutes before getting out of the hot water to the freezing outside
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my grandmother on her 90th birthday. She absolutely loves it! She uses it for towels, slippers, blankets and her bathrobe. There was a bit of a smell once she ran it a few times, but she took care of that by turning it on with the lid off about five or six times.
customer_reviews.author: William's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Never thought of having one. But boy is it nice. 10 minutes in the shower and step out to a toasty towel. Heaven!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot, hot ,hot!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon for asking me to leave a review as this was a Christmas gift that I had forgotten to give.... but it heats up fast!
customer_reviews.author: Erik T.

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 star without that odor
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this. In the time I spend in the shower it gets warm enough. There is still a slight odor after 4 cycles. It does not really make the towel smell. Careful not to touch the inside wall near the bottom when the red light is on. It will hurt!
customer_reviews.author: d stegman

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Towels
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, but make sure you load the towel loosely. Otherwise some parts won't get warm before the unit automatically shuts off the heating cycle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We loved the product, but it quit working in less than a year
customer_reviews.author: Team T

customer_reviews.title: Ho-hum. Heats unevenly. Smells.
customer_reviews.text: After 9 months it still has a weird smell. It takes 10 minutes at least to warm up your towel. It doesn't heat evenly. Sometimes part of it burns me when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Evg

customer_reviews.title: Good for towels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Towel Warmer for my boyfriend, for Valentine's Day. He loves it! He's pretty tall and has an extra large thick fleece blanket, and he put the blanket in the warmer and it warmed it very well. The only thing I realized is that if you buy this for blankets, why not just put them in the dryer? That was the only thing that I thought of. Still a great warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: How did we live without our towel warmer? It's like your towel gives you a warm hug after each shower. We use it year-round. We've purchased 3 more for gifts and each recipient loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, while it worked
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my brother and sister-in-law. They received it in early December and began using it immediately. They stated that they loved it and worked fairly well, though it took them a few tries before figuring out how to place the towel in so that a full section would be warm when pulled out. Unfortunately, my sister-in-law just informed me that it stopped working all together last week. This means that it was a functioning warmer for a total of less than two months. Not worth $100 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Hillstrom

customer_reviews.title: It works great just fold your towel in half Long ways and ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great just fold your towel in half Long ways and roll up the towel in a loose roll and drop it in and your towel will be warm when your done your shower.
customer_reviews.author: Donald G.

customer_reviews.title: basically a good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this towel warmer, it is big enough for a couple large towels or one robe and it looks attractive. It works best when I unfold the towels before putting them in and arrange them in a circle inside so that as much of the towel as possible is touching the edges of the warmer. I do wish it got the towels just a little warmer and kept them warm longer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bixel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it, has lasted almost over a year with 3 days/week average usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. Makes you want to wrap yourself in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Makes you want to wrap yourself in the hot towel when you step out of the shower. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A Ryder

customer_reviews.title: I love this towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel warmer, we have had for a few months and my whole famy uses it. I have to say some parts of the towel don't get hot but I'm going to try resetting as someone else said, maybe that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo girl

customer_reviews.title: No consistency - you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Even with only one towel you get hot spots and cold spots. If you leave it in longer, it can click of and the towel is not warm. This is the best of the cheap ones we have tried, but still not great. I think it is just physics. If you want a consistent warm-all-over towel you either have to have a large warmer that touches the whole town at once or back it for enough time to warm it all the way through, using a lot of electricity. We are returning this one, and giving up on warm towels until we afford to buy a professional model.
customer_reviews.author: John Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: The odor from the coating products on the inside lingers, but does not adhere to the towels. However, the unit does not heat up for the lower 2-inches. I put the tips of my towels at that level.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Haynor

customer_reviews.title: Only parts of the towel or blanket heat up so ...
customer_reviews.text: Only parts of the towel or blanket heat up so when you use it you get hot and cold spots around your body.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Brookstone towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: Best warmer I've bought so far, it's our 3rd. The others never got that s warm and didn't last. Let's see how long this one lasts. I would buy another just for the temperature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love the towel warmer. It works very well and met all my expectations. I purchased it for my husband for Christmas. He broke his back 4 years ago and says the warm towels after a shower makes his back feel much better as it takes the cold air away after bathing. Works warming your roes and pajamas. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I use this outside with my hot tub and it generally works well as intended. however, during cold weather like we've been having, it really doesn't keep the towels warm due to it's shutting off after a few minutes, therefore allowing the towels to get cool by the time you get out of the tub. it needs to stay on until it's turned off, that should fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: D. Speer

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a couple months and completely died out on me!
customer_reviews.author: Jasprit Singh

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great when it works. This one lasted only 13 months then stopped warming. This was my second one. Brookstone, you can do better.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia VanBree

customer_reviews.title: My husband got me one some time ago and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. My husband got me one some time ago and I love it too
customer_reviews.author: M Loy

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Very warm towels. Plan to use it just inside from my outdoor hot tub. The plastic smell is really not very bad and it diminishes quickly after venting or several uses. Decent capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Buckeyes

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but it's average.
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok. Has a funny smell when warming up the towels. I have had this for about six months and the smell has not gone away. Nothing really strong, just noticeable.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product as long as it works (had to replace ...

customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife for Christmas - scored big points! I like it, too. There is a slight plastic odor when it's heating, but we don't find it that bothersome. That's the only thing that keeps it from being a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Daughter big hit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a Christmas gift for my daughter. They live in a basement apartment that's sometimes a bit chilly and had mentioned the idea of a towel warmer as something they would enjoy. I picked this one because of it's quick warming time and positive reviews. They love it! Not only for warming bath towels, for for robes and blankets, as well. I'm very happy about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hayden DeTar

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Brookstone my first served me well hopefully this one will too.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second brookstone towel warmer . The first one gave me 3+ years of deliciously warm towels. I'm hoping for the same with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S. Mcmullen

customer_reviews.title: Best towel warmer ever
customer_reviews.text: Best towel warmer ever!. Bought one for my daughter at college. Loved it so much, I purchased a 2nd one for myself. Makes a perfect gift
customer_reviews.author: Beth B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Doesn't take up too much room in ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Doesn't take up too much room in the bathroom. works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Farrell

customer_reviews.title: On switch breaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift and after two times using it, the switch quit working. I've bought 2 for myself that the switch quit working too. Sad, because you get hooked on having a nice warm towel.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Rindt

customer_reviews.title: This towel warmer is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Our bathroom tends to be cold and my husband often complains about the cold towels. Gave him this for Christmas. I had read all the reviews and was a bit concerned about it giving off an odor in the beginning. A friend answered that easily with the suggestion to plug it in in the garage. Ran half a dozen times and no more odor. It easily takes one regular bath towel and one bath sheet. I do not know why we did not buy one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Maxlmom

customer_reviews.title: Good but fragile
customer_reviews.text: The one I ordered arrived with a broken top and cover. I went to Brookstone where they changed it for free, so that was nice I guess. After exchanging it I enjoyed how it works
customer_reviews.author: Raymund C. Vergara

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISED ME!!  Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this style of towel warmer because I thought my wife would like it. I was not expecting alot the other style from brookstone got really mixed reviews. But this one works great, took about 5 cycles to burn off the factory smell but warms the towels nicely. My wife even commented that it's almost too hot. I don't write many reviews but this one deserves the high rating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy in somd

customer_reviews.title: It is far better than my first
customer_reviews.text: This is my second stilted towel warmer. It is far better than my first. And would never take a shower without it.

customer_reviews.title: but it is better now.
customer_reviews.text: I can put my robe in, then the towel, and they are both warm to hot, depending on the length of my shower. It had a little bit of an odor at first, but it is better now.

Disappointed in Brookstone products recently poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product- I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product, I will never take a shower without it again. It does have an initial plastic-like smell the first few times you use it, but this goes away with time. Incredible product- I love it.

customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Good gift. Be careful reaching inside this thing. Gets very hot. Neat little luxury item. About the size of a 30 gallon trash container
customer_reviews.author: R.F.

customer_reviews.title: Warm in the winter
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great buy. It is a luxurious feeling to get out of the shower and have a toasty towel. Follow the instructions and you will be very happy with this towel warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Given the price, and the hassle-free of installing, compared to the wall mounted kind, this is a great deal!! It claims to be able to warm 2 large towels. I guess the definition of "large" comes into question. My two large towels wouldn't fit in it. I gave this to my wife for Mothers Day, and she loved it! I think this will make for some great presents this year. I intend to buy more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Perry

customer_reviews.title: It feels great to get out of the shower and have a ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels great to get out of the shower and have a warm towel. Especially with the cold days we are having
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Weber

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase - broke down after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for all of nine months (most of that not in use, during the summer). Returns allowed only for the first two months after the purchase. Other than that, not a good product - when the power is on, it emits a smell, like a wire insulation is being overheated. If you do not intend to use this product, I recommend it, as it looks nice just sitting in your bathroom. When you use it, it does manage to heat the towels nicely (much better than a heated towel rack) and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie_NYC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I anticipated. And most important of all, my wife really loves it !!
customer_reviews.author: RES

customer_reviews.title: Still Smells- alter all this time!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this towel warmer at least 50 times in the last two months- (my kids love it) and it still smells each time I use it. For those that say only the towel smells- when you dry your kids hair quickly and then wrap it around them, they will complain about that smell! It shows no sign of getting better. However, it was a good value, as towel warmers go- and we do like using it. No wonder they don't have this at the store currently- the smell would cause no-one to by it if they smelled it in person!
